text: @afneil Alarming! On 5 March Government classified Covid19 as notifiable disease requiring certain legal obs i.e testing, monitoring et al not just recording deaths or some random approach https://t.co/xlgONF6GZw Yet in this 'national emergency' gov does not lead?'
